item1.name: Moments by the train
item1.description: Sip coffee by Hanoi Train Street and hear the carriage rumble past.

item2.name: Inside the cafe
item2.description: Warm, cozy seating and soft light for lingering chats or focused work.

item3.name: Chill afternoon
item3.description: Soft music, warm lights, and espresso aroma for an easy afternoon.

item4.name: Weekend date
item4.description: A cozy table, golden lights, and sweets for a warm meetup.

hero.title: Drop In Cafe
hero.line1: Australian & Vietnamese coffee culture in Hanoi Old Quarter.
hero.line2: Our famous egg coffee is a must-try.
hero.line3: Right across from the historic Train Street.
hero.line4: Visit for a truly unique cafe experience.

signature.heading: Signature Lineup
signature.sub: Handcrafted drinks highlighting the best of Drop In Cafe.
signature.empty: No drinks are marked as Signature Lineup yet.

menuCta.title: See the menu at a glance
menuCta.description: Tap the image to zoom, or open the full menu for details.

scrollStroke.card1Title: Claim Your Spot, Savor the View
scrollStroke.card1Body: Forget the apps and pre-orders. Just drop in, pick your favorite corner by the Train Street, and let us serve you. Whether you're here for the signature Egg Coffee or the view, we make sure your experience is worth the pause.
scrollStroke.card2Title: Heavy Workload? Find Your Flow Here
scrollStroke.card2Body: When emails and deadlines pile up, let DropInCafe keep you steady. Our seamless service ensures your tea or coffee arrives exactly when you need a boost, letting you stay focused on your screen while the train rolls by.
scrollStroke.img1Alt: Guest scanning to pick up a pre-ordered drink at DropInCafe
scrollStroke.img2Alt: DropInCafe digital order dashboard for seamless pickup
scrollStroke.img3Alt: Barista preparing drinks efficiently by the Train Street window
scrollStroke.img4Alt: Customer grabbing a coffee cup at the pickup counter

blog.metaDescription: Stories, updates, and notes from Drop In Cafe.
blog.title: Blog
blog.subtitle: Stories, updates, and notes from the Drop In Cafe team.
blog.emptyBody: We are getting the first posts ready. Check back soon for updates.

bestSellers.title: Drinks that keep regulars coming back
bestSellers.intro: We want a small stop where you can drop in, linger long enough to watch a train pass, chat with your companion, or finish a few lines of work. Every detail from menu and lighting to the seats right by the tracks is designed to help you feel welcomed and more connected to this city and to each other.
bestSellers.empty: No items are marked as best-sellers yet.

homeStory.stat2: Cups served by the train tracks
homeStory.title: Where the train rhythm meets coffee
homeStory.body: Drop In Cafe was born beside Hanoi Train Street, where every passing carriage carries a new story. Each egg coffee, flat white, or iced matcha is made deliberately, balancing aroma, flavor, and the feeling you take with you after leaving. We built a small stop where you can drop in, linger long enough to watch a train roll by, talk with your companion, or finish a few lines of work. Every detail from the menu and lighting to the seats by the tracks is designed to make you feel welcomed and more connected to this city and to each other.

privacy.metaDescription: Learn how Drop In Cafe collects, uses, and protects your data when you visit dropincafe.com.vn or contact us.
privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.tagline: We protect your information when you browse dropincafe.com.vn or reach out for drink orders, quotes, or event support.

quickPoints.title: Clear purpose
quickPoints.description: We only collect what we need to respond to you, send quotes, process orders, and improve your experience.

quickPoints.title: No selling data
quickPoints.description: We never sell personal data. Sharing, when needed, is limited to vetted providers that help us operate.

quickPoints.title: Your control
quickPoints.description: You may request access, corrections, deletion, or withdraw consent at any time.

quickPoints.title: Layered security
quickPoints.description: Restricted internal access plus technical and organizational safeguards to reduce risk.

sections.title: 1. Scope & applicability
sections.summary: This policy covers information we collect whenever you interact with Drop In Cafe.
items: Applies when you visit dropincafe.com.vn, submit contact forms, call, email, message us on social channels, or speak with us at the cafe.
By using the site or sharing information, you agree to the terms in this policy.

sections.title: 2. Information we collect
items: Information you provide: name, email, phone number, inquiry details, order/service information, feedback, or reviews.
Technical data collected automatically: IP address, browser, device, operating system, entry/exit pages, time on page, and basic interactions.
Cookies and similar technologies to remember preferences and measure site performance.

sections.title: 3. How we use your information
items: Respond to inquiries, send quotes, and confirm or follow up on drink orders or services.
Improve content speed, reliability, and experience on dropincafe.com.vn.
Send important updates (for example: opening hours changes, menu updates, or order follow-ups).
Detect and prevent fraud or misuse of our systems.

sections.title: 4. Cookies & tracking
items: We use cookies to remember preferences, measure engagement, and optimize site performance.
You can disable cookies in your browser. Some features may be limited when cookies are turned off.

sections.title: 5. Sharing your information
items: We do not sell personal data to third parties.
We may share data with service providers (hosting, analytics, payment, marketing tools) to run and improve the site.
We may share with partners or contractors related to your order/service when necessary, under confidentiality obligations.
We comply with lawful requests from authorities when required.

sections.title: 6. Data security
items: We apply technical and organizational measures to prevent unauthorized access, alteration, or disclosure.
Internal access to personal data is limited based on role and business need.
While we strive for security, no method of transmission or storage is absolutely secure.

sections.title: 7. Data retention
items: We keep data only as long as needed to fulfill the purposes for which it was collected.
We delete or anonymize data upon request unless a longer retention period is required by law.

sections.title: 8. Your rights
items: Request access to, correction of, or deletion of your personal data.
Withdraw consent or object to certain processing activities.
Submit a request via the contact details below; we respond within a reasonable time.

sections.title: 9. Third-party links
items: Our site may link to external websites or services.
We are not responsible for their content or privacy practices. Please review their policies separately.

sections.title: 10. Children?s privacy
items: Our site is not intended for children under 13, and we do not knowingly collect data from them.
If you believe we hold data about a child, please contact us so we can remove it promptly.

sections.title: 11. Changes to this policy
items: We may update this policy and will post the latest version on this page.
We encourage you to review it periodically. Last updated: Dec 2, 2025.

contact.title: Talk to Drop In Cafe
contact.description: If you have questions or want to exercise your privacy rights, please reach us via:
contact.address: 163 Phung Hung, Cua Dong, Hoan Kiem, Ha Noi

privacy.rightsCopy: We respond within a reasonable timeframe (typically within 1-2 business days) and may verify your identity to protect your data.
rightsBullets: Request a copy of the personal data you shared with us.
Ask for corrections to inaccurate or incomplete information.
Request deletion unless we must retain it to meet legal obligations.
Withdraw consent for non-essential emails or messages.
